value:
This outfit is...actually nice, I'll admit.
But a stain or maybe some twigs and
leaves stuck on it couldn't hurt.

I don't know why Hoshido wants to
have outdoor parties on New Year's.
It's so much warmer inside...

I went to the shrine to make my New
Year's wish. What was it? To spend
more time with Daddy, of course.

I've heard that children get special
gifts on New Year's. You can give me
mine now, $Nu.

Is that... *sniff sniff*... roasted mochi
I smell? Mmm...

I'm Velouria. Can I smell your castle?
*sniff sniff*... Hmm...different from
$Nf's, but good.

Oh, it's like finding a hairball on the
side of the road! This year is going to
be great.

I'm off to a good start this year.
Daddy is sure to be impressed.

It's too cold out for this. Should have
stayed home with my treasures...

If you really want to give it away...
I guess I can take it off your hands.

Nice to meet you. I'm Velouria.
Oh, I'm supposed to wish you
Happy New Year too, right?

According to Selkie, the people of
Hoshido say that New Year's Day is
the key to the rest of the year.$k$pI like the idea of setting goals for the
year from the start. I think that makes
a lot of sense.$k$pSo here's what I decided I'm going
to do, $Nu.$k$pI'm going to spend each day this year
searching every corner of Askr for all
the very best dust bunnies.$k$pWhat? Hey, if I got a dust bunny for
each time someone reacted like that,
I'd already have a huge collection.$k$pSo if you think about it, in a way, it's
sort of your fault I spend so much
time collecting dust bunnies, isn't it?
やあ
I will defeat you.
きゃあっ
So stubborn...
Let's party!
Gimme cash!
Happy New Year!
Almost nap time!
Not a good year after all...
Phew...
Woken up early AND I gotta wear these fancy things? Bleah.
Does my outfit look all right? Would you straighten it up a bit?
*sniff* You smell that? We're gonna eat it later!
I found lots of treasures during my big clean. So many dust bunnies!
Everybody's taking a break for New Year's. I can play with ANYBODY today!
Daddy's wearing a kimono too! He looks so handsome!
My New Years' resolution is to get more scratches behind the ears.
OK
What now?
Back to work.
